column15: Buy original Rohit Bal Womens Stole at best price in India. Read its features  reviews and specifications. Get fast & assured delivery all over India.
column17:
Rohit Bal Women's Red Stole:
Adorn yourself with this vibrant red stole which is an exclusive designer accessory featured in the 2013 collection by Rohit Bal. This stole is made from a soft and sheer fabric with a wrinkled pattern. The designer's renowned motif 'lotus' is printed all over this stole which also comprises a beautiful golden border. Wrap this stunning stole from Rohit Bal around your neck and complete any party attire with perfection.
